changelog: v1.5.2: Module 2 — System Benchmarks. Pure Python CPU ST/MT (sqrt+log loop), RAM bandwidth (256MB), disk I/O (128MB). Background thread — never blocks UI. Noise floor warning (>15% CPU). Temp capture (start, peak, end). First run auto-tagged as baseline; delta shown on all subsequent runs. History table (last 5 runs). Quick mode (~12s), Full mode (~60s).
changes: NEW: System benchmark card in Forge tab
NEW: CPU single-thread + multi-thread benchmark (sqrt+log loop, 4M ops)
NEW: RAM bandwidth benchmark (256MB write+read, GB/s)
NEW: Disk I/O benchmark (128MB write+read, MB/s)
NEW: Quick mode (CPU ST+MT ~12s) and Full mode (all 4 ~60s)
NEW: Noise floor warning shown if CPU load >15% at benchmark start
NEW: Temp capture at start, peak, end during benchmark run
NEW: First run auto-tagged as baseline; delta % shown green/red on all subsequent
NEW: History table shows last 5 runs with date, ST, MT, temp, and baseline tag
